title: PMS 2.0 770 - Thursday Night Football Preview, Kirk Herbstreit, Jordan Schultz, Coach P's Keys With Chuck Pagano LIVE From The ThunderDome, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today’s show, Pat, Darius Butler, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about tonight’s Thursday Night Football game between the Ravens and Buccaneers, what each team needs to do to win tonight, if we should trust Tom Brady to get things right, Kadarius Toney getting traded to the Chiefs for a 3rd and 6th round pick, and everything else happening around the NFL as we head into week 8. Joining the progrum to chat about tonight’s Thursday Night Football game and what he’s learned about each team this week is the voice of Thursday Night Football, the face of College Football, friend of the show, Kirk Herbstreit (10:12-23:17). Next, everyone’s favorite insider, Jordan Schultz joins the show to break down the Kadarius Toney trade and what other trades might be on the horizon (1:07:58-1:12:43). Also joining the progrum for his weekly hit, and to chat about what he did on his bye week and this weekend's huge primetime tilt against the Packers is 2x Super Bowl Champion, Super Bowl MVP, and future Hall of Famer, Von Miller (2:03:46-2:20:39). Later, former Head Coach of the Indianapolis Colts, Chuck Pagano joins the show for his weekly Coach P’s Keys segment to break down the keys to victory for both the Baltimore Ravens (1:41:50-2:03:44), and the Tampa Bay Buccaneers (2:20:41-2:46:33). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
